Hi,

I am having a Testcase called as LoggerTest, I have instantiated both 
the dynamic way and the type safe way and in both cases I get an 
error NoSuchMethodError: junit.framework.TestCase: method name()
LJava/lang/String; not found.
static way:
----------
suite.addTest( new LoggerTest("testEqualsFind"){
      protected void runTest(){
        this.testEqualsFind();
      }
}
and I return the suite.

and the method 
public void testEqualsFind(){
//do something here
}
dynamic way
------------

return new TestSuite(LoggerTest.class);

I am using ant1.3 and junit3.8.1 to build my classesand tests and 
also integrating junit with ant.

has someone have encountered this problem, if so if a solution is 
found could you please reply back.

thanks in advance.

regards,

David
